intro.p: The sections below gives an overall explanation of the inner working of Castle Anakia.

section.title: The process
section.p: The NAnt task runs against a content folder, recursively. An object model is constructed and populated to reflect that structure. See the figure below.
Each physical folder will be represented by a Folder instance. A Folder holds a collection of DocumentNodes. Each DocumentNode has a type:

ul.li: Ordinary: used for all other xml files in the folder

section.p: A set of visitors transverse the object model to create the site map, breadcrumbs and finally the html files.

section.title: The transformation
section.p: The transformation of the xml content is handled by a NVelocity template. The following context entries are made available to the template:

tr.td: List of BreadCrumb instances. Each BreadCrumb has a Title and a Relative property that allow you to generate the links
Instance of DocumentMeta which is created for each document content based on the properties node
The XmlElement for the current content file
The DocumentNode instance for the content file
A XmlElement for the generated sitemap
An instance of SimpleConverter that is able to convert strings to different types
A XmlElement with the content of navigation.xml
The relative path to access the root folder.
